Uses of Package
com.danga.MemCached

Packages that use com.danga.MemCached
com.danga.MemCached   
com.danga.MemCached.test   
 

Classes in com.danga.MemCached used by com.danga.MemCached
ErrorHandler
          This is an interface implemented by classes that want to receive callbacks in the event of an error in MemCachedClient.
Logger
          This is a generic logger class for use in logging.
MemCachedClient
          This is a Java client for the memcached server available from http://www.danga.com/memcached/.
SockIOPool
          This class is a connection pool for maintaning a pool of persistent connections
to memcached servers.
SockIOPool.MaintThread
          Class which extends thread and handles maintenance of the pool.
SockIOPool.SockIO
          MemCached Java client, utility class for Socket IO.
 

Classes in com.danga.MemCached used by com.danga.MemCached.test
Logger
          This is a generic logger class for use in logging.
MemCachedClient
          This is a Java client for the memcached server available from http://www.danga.com/memcached/.
